org.javasimon.utils.bean
Interface Converter

All Known Implementing Classes:
ToBooleanConverter, ToByteConverter, ToDoubleConverter, ToEnumConverter, ToFloatConverter, ToCharConverter, ToIntegerConverter, ToLongConverter, ToShortConverter, ToStringConverter
public interface Converter

Interface for converting string values to a values of a property in Java bean.

Author:
Ivan Mushketyk

Method Summary
 Object convert(Class<?> targetClass, String strVal)
          Converts string values to an object of a bean property.
 

Method Detail

convert

Object convert(Class<?> targetClass,
               String strVal)
               throws ConvertException
Converts string values to an object of a bean property.

Parameters:
targetClass - type of property
strVal - value to convert
Returns:
conversion result
Throws:
ConvertException - in case if string value cannot be converted a target class
